title: How to write content about any event - Quora

response.answer_text: Let me put it to you in key points to be short and Crisp, Be Contemporary (Most important).Your pre-event promos or branding should have been effective for post-event press release or any sort of success or celebratory materials to be followed by the mass.Have highlights more in the content which is very necessary.Images and Infographics (Very Important for both pre- and post-).Flaunt it & highlight it with images and others if your event has had great key points like celebrity endorsements, awards, sponsorships (must) and any other sorts of recognitions.Be highly creative but relevant and down-to-earth with the writing.Remember that the need for Content is to Engage the reader or the audience, unless we do that, there is no task to it.Use SMM in both pre- and post-, but more when it is post-event completion as people like reading and watching interesting stuffs, especially like celebrations.All the very best !!
